package.name: blast+
package.readme:
Downloads the precompiled 64bit Linux BLAST+ binaries from the NCBI, which is faster than performing a local compliation, avoids any issues with build dependencies, and is more reproducible between installations as there is no variability from the compiler or library versions.
If/when the Galaxy installation framework allows for 32bit versus 64bit, or different operating system, the NCBI binaries cover the main cases.
For more details, see: http://blast.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Blast.cgi?CMD=Web&PAGE_TYPE=BlastDocs&DOC_TYPE=Download
